results.content:
Really, amazing course, and instructor :)
I got a lot of information about Material Design :)
results.content_html:
Really, amazing course, and instructor :)

results.content: A little hard to understand, and seems to be brushing over alot of the concepts.
results.content_html: A little hard to understand, and seems to be brushing over alot of the concepts.

results.content:
Much repetition. Does not explain the Google material design principles. Instead, just mentioning class name usage, without explanation how those classes interact. 
I would like to know, why class names are grouped by '--' dash dash and '__' underscores. So I can guess / predict class names.
I like references to external sites for more details. Where can I read more info on 'mdl-card' for example. Or MDL, etc.
I was triggered to this course of the Cordova aspect, which was very basic. I try to follow the steps to use Cordova, but it failed because I didn't have Android SDK.
The course has potential, but need to grow.
results.content_html:
Much repetition. Does not explain the Google material design principles. Instead, just mentioning class name usage, without explanation how those classes interact.
I would like to know, why class names are grouped by '--' dash dash and '__' underscores. So I can guess / predict class names.
I like references to external sites for more details. Where can I read more info on 'mdl-card' for example. Or MDL, etc.
I was triggered to this course of the Cordova aspect, which was very basic. I try to follow the steps to use Cordova, but it failed because I didn't have Android SDK.
The course has potential, but need to grow.

results.content: The tutorial was good!  Some of the code did not quite work out when I was following it but, since there was a download of the full site at the end of the tutorial, I was able to debug and get it working.
results.content_html: The tutorial was good! Some of the code did not quite work out when I was following it but, since there was a download of the full site at the end of the tutorial, I was able to debug and get it working.

results.content: It is a basic MDL course. Before taking this class, have a little knowledge of JavaScript and CSS. Then, it will help you to complete the course. Overall, it is a good class.
results.content_html: It is a basic MDL course. Before taking this class, have a little knowledge of JavaScript and CSS. Then, it will help you to complete the course. Overall, it is a good class.

results.content:
With this course, you will walk through building a fairly decent website. You'll leave with a pretty good understanding of the topic. I could see what the instructor was doing and got a better understanding by following along with the website:

websitehttps://getmdl.io/components/index.html

Full source code for the project is provided at the bottom of the course.
